Test Name: CABBAGE, IgE, and Serum analyte assays
Purpose: To analyze CABBAGE antibodies, quantify Immunoglobulin E (IgE), and measure serum analytes to provide accurate diagnostic results.
Container: Serum collected and aliquoted into labeled microcentrifuge tubes (originally from serum-separator tubes)
Equipment: Analytical balances, microcentrifuge, incubators, 96-well microplates, ELISA plate reader, automated immunoassay analyzer
